item.description:
Ever wonder what hypnosis/hypnotherapy really is?  If you could be hypnotized?  Does it really work?  What is it good for?  How it could help you in your life?

Join Glenn Bigonet, Clinical Hypnotherapist, for this 2 hour discussion and demonstration of hypnotherapy and get all of your questions answered and more.

Learn:

  • The truth about hypnosis: what it is, and what it isn't.
  • How you can use hypnosis to help you in your life without extensive training.
  • What waking hypnosis is and how it can be used to control you.
  • The different levels of hypnosis and the benefits of each.
  • The different modalities of hypnotherapy.
  • The secrets of how to use a pendulum.
  • A simple yet powerful technique for reducing anxiety.

Glenn Bigonet is a Mental Health Counselor in private practice in Needham.  He regularly uses hypnosis and teaches self-hypnosis to help his clients free themselves of their emotional blocks so that they can feel freer and more in control of their lives.  For more information about Glenn and his work visit his website at www.glennbigonet.com.
item.name: Hypnotherapy: What is it Really? An Informative and Fun Event
